description: The core Role-Based Access Control framework must be in place before any feature can be properly secured and tested.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize US-070 and its tasks in Sprint 1.
impact_if_delayed: Cascading delay to all subsequent sprints.

description: A trip must be created (US-026) before a driver/vehicle can be assigned to it (US-027).
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire trip execution workflow.

description: The Odoo consumer job for GPS data must be functional before the frontend map view can be developed to display the data.
mitigation_plan: Define a clear API contract for the location data endpoint early. Backend can provide a mock endpoint for frontend development.

description: The invoice model (`account.move`) must be finalized for e-invoicing before open invoices can be migrated from the legacy system.
mitigation_plan: Schedule data migration in a later sprint after all core financial models are stable.
